quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词"photography"（摄影）联想错误，或因词根"litho-"（石）+"-graphy"（书写）直译为"石刻"，忽略其"平版印刷术"的核心义。
quiz_item.sentence: The museum exhibit showcases 19th-century **lithography** works, created by etching designs on limestone and pressing them onto paper to produce detailed prints.

option.definition: 平版印刷术（尤指石版印刷）
